original_text: As for me, I am under your authority. Do with me whatever you think is good and right.
korean_text: 보라 나는 너희 손에 있으니 너희 의견에 좋은 대로, 옳은 대로 하려니와

sentences.original_text: As for me, I am under your authority.
whatever you think is good and right.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 좋고 옳다고 생각하는 것은 무엇이든
